Package paintingcanvas.drawable

Interface Anchorable<T extends Drawable<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Animatable, Drawable<T>, Positionable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, DrawableBase.InteractableShape, DrawableBase.Shape, Ellipse, Image, Rectangle, Square, Text, Triangle
    public interface Anchorable<T extends Drawable<T>>
extends Drawable<T>, Positionable<T>
